content: photo 2 cid 1 repeat from * 4 more times ending with chain 1 3 double_crochet in next ch1 space cid 1 chain 2 join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beginning ch3 round 5 cid 1 repeat pattern established in round 4 round 6-10 change back to main color cid 1 with main color repeat pattern established in round 4 photo #1 shows second color change on row 8 & 9 fasten_off weave in ends sew hexagons together cid 1 fold hexagons to form 2 sides of the jacket see photo #2 fasten top seam with stitch markers to hold in photo 3 place cid 1 holding back pieces with right sides together and working through outside loops of stitches only sew two halves together at back seam see photo #3 cid 1 working in outside loops only stitch shoulder seams across top of jacket from cuff to third 3dc-group from photo 4 inner seam front neck edge repeat for second shoulder cuffs cid 1 round 1 using contrast yarn join with slip_stitch anywhere on cuff edge ch1 single_crochet in same stitch single_crochet in each stitch and chain-1 space around join with slip stitch to beginning slip_stitch cid 1 round 2 ch1 single_crochet in same stitch decrease around see stitch guide join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet cid 1 round 3 ch2 half_double_crochet in same stitch and each stitch around cid 1 round 4 repeat round 3 cid 1 round 5 o working in the back loop only chain 4 o * double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet chain 1 in same stitch as join o * double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet chain 1 in next stitch photo 5 outer seam o repeat from * around o join with a slipstitch in 3rd chain of beginning chain 4 fasten_off repeat for second cuff sweater edging cid 1 join contrast color with slip_stitch in center back of jacket cid 1 single_crochet in each stitch and space along bottom edge cid 1 * 2 single_crochet chain 2 2 single_crochet at corner cid 1 single_crochet in each stitch and space along front edge* cid 1 2 single_crochet chain 2 2 single_crochet at corner cid 1 single_crochet in each stitch only not in space between 3dc clusters around neck cid 1 repeat from * to * slip_stitch in first single_crochet fasten_off bottom edge of jacket cid 1 round 1 with right side facing join yarn in right corner on bottom of sweater o chain 2 half_double_crochet in same stitch and each stitch across chain 2 turn cid 1 round 2 repeat round 1 cid 1 round 3 working in the back loop only chain 4 o double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet chain 1 in same stitch as join o * double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet chain 1 in next stitch o repeat from * around join with a slipstitch in 3rd chain of beginning chain 4 fasten_off button band and neck cid 1 round 1 with wrong side facing join yarn in
